com.luntsys.luntbuild.db
Class Build

java.lang.Object
  com.luntsys.luntbuild.db.Build

public class Build
extends java.lang.Object

This class mapps to a hibernate entity. It represents a execution result of a particular schedule

Author:
robin shine
